data.message: Rap God super sonic speed *uhh summer luma duma luma u assuming im a human/wat I gotta do to get through um super human/innovative nd im made of rubber so dat anything u say I ricocheting off me nd it'll glue to u/im devasted more than demonstrated/how to give these motherfucking audience a feeling lyk it's lavetating nvr fading nd I kno the haters ar forever waiting for the day they'll think I fell of they'll be celebrating coz I know to get them motivated/I make elevating music, u make elevator music
